name: Xero & Salesforce: CAC (Last 30 Days)
description: Let this Klip address the most important question on your marketing team - what is our cost to acquire a customer (CAC)? This Klip uses your monthly Xero and Salesforce data to answer that very question. Originates from the Gallery.

xero-02.name: Xero Profit & Loss (Prev 30 Days)
xero-02.description: Retrieve the Profit and Loss Report for the previous 30 Days. Originates from the Gallery.

salesforce.name: Salesforce New Customers (Last 60 Days)
salesforce.description: Retrieve the list of New Customer in the last 60 Days. Originates from the Gallery.

props.SOQLQuery: SELECT Type, StageName, CloseDate, Amount, Probability FROM Opportunity WHERE CloseDate < Today AND CloseDate >= LAST_N_DAYS:60 AND Probability = 100
